subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: On the field, Ray Rice is known as a battering-ram running back. But in New Rochelle, N.Y., he is known for a much gentler side from his work with special-needs students.
snippet: On the field, Ray Rice is known as a battering-ram running back. But in New Rochelle, N.Y., he is known for a much gentler side from his work with special-needs students.
